Comments.value:
Thanks for your inquiry. We're pleased to offer our quotation for your consideration.
We offer both types of our Nitrogen for your consideration. ***Kindly refer attached product sheet and check with vessel which item is required before order confirmation.
All quoted items are out of stock.
Item 1 (N-5030) Lead time: 6 - 8 working days subject to carrier approval and custom clearance.
Item 2 (N-5050) Lead time: 2 - 3 working days subject to carrier approval and custom clearance.
Delivery Charge (alongside) @ PORT ALLEN: USD442 Delivery Lead time: 1 - 2 working days Subject to additional delivery charge, hire of barge/crane, custom fee, etc.
Please allow another 1-2 working daysâ€™ notice for delivery arrangement.
Cylinder deposits will be applicable if vessel does not have any Unitor Cylinder in return.
We look forward to receiving your earliest order confirmation. Best Regards, Edlyn Tan Links to product catalog: Product information for line item 1 product 905208 https://wilhelmsen.com/product-catalogue/products/gases-refrigerants-and-cylinders/gases/nitrogen/nitrogen-n-5030-filling Product information for line item 2 product 905601 https://wilhelmsen.com/product-catalogue/products/gases-refrigerants-and-cylinders/gases/nitrogen/nitrogen-n-5050-filling
